hero.title: About ScholarPath
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in discovering scholarships and government benefits you're eligible for. We simplify the complex process of finding and applying for financial aid.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At ScholarPath, we believe that financial constraints should never be a barrier to education. Our mission is to connect students and eligible individuals with the scholarships and benefits they deserve, making the application process as simple and transparent as possible.

eligibility.title: Accurate Eligibility Matching
eligibility.description: Our advanced algorithm ensures you only see scholarships and benefits you're fully eligible for, saving you time and effort.

guidance.title: Step-by-Step Guidance

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Students from various categories like farmers, SC/ST/OBC, women, EWS, and merit-based individuals can apply if they meet the eligibility criteria.
faq.q2: Is this platform free to use?
faq.a2: Yes, 100% free. You can search and explore all available scholarships without any charges.
faq.q3: How do I know which scholarships I am eligible for?
faq.a3: Just select your category and answer a few questions. Our platform will filter the scholarships that best match your profile.
faq.q4: Are the scholarships provided by the government?
faq.a4: Yes, all scholarships listed on our site are verified and issued by central or state governments.
faq.q5: How often is the data updated?
faq.a5: We update our database regularly to include new schemes and remove expired ones.
